name: desktopbrowser
description: Web based file explorer, runs locally on your browser, designed for media desktops.

scripts.postinstall: npm install client/ --prefix client/ --no-bin-links && npm install server/ --prefix server/ --no-bin-links
scripts.compile: tsc -p client && tsc -p server && sass client/scss/main.scss:client/css/main.css
scripts.dev: start cmd /C tsc -p client -w && start cmd /C tsc -p server -w && npm start

author: Dan-el Khen
